author: admin
title: Containment Grows on New Mexico Wildfires, as Rains and Cooler Weather Help
text:
Containment has grown on a pair of New Mexico wildfires that caused that destroyed thousands of structures and forced the evacuation of more than 8,000 people.
The Salt and South Fork fires have burned more than 25,000 acres. The South Force fire, the biggest blaze, is 31% contained. The Salt fire is 7% contained.
‚ÄúThe South Fork and Salt fires saw additional precipitation on Saturday, making it difficult for crews to access some areas due to unsafe conditions,‚Äù an update from the New Mexico Fire Information service states. ‚ÄúOn Sunday, weather conditions will allow firefighters to continue securing the perimeter and responding to hot spots within the interior of the fire area.‚Äù
There are 1,114 personnel assigned to the fires, and 88 engines, 13 dozers and 18 water tenders.
Recent rains and cooler weather have assisted firefighters working to contain the fires.
Today has a potential for scattered storms, as warmer weather moves into the area. Temperatures are expected to warm to above normal with mostly light winds.
Federal authorities are offering a reward for information about people responsible for igniting the wildfires, which have killed two people. The FBI on Saturday offered up to $10,000 for information in connection with the fires.
Related:
Growing Wildfires in New Mexico Destroyed 1,400 Structures New Mexico Wildfires Spread to 20,000 Acres, Forcing Thousands to Evacuate New Mexico Town Ordered to Evacuate Due to Large, Uncontained Wildfire

author: diariouno
title: Pol\u00e9mica decisi\u00f3n: Misiones cobrar\u00e1 una tasa tur\u00edstica a visitantes extranjeros
text: La provincia de Misiones cobrar√° a partir del a√±o pr√≥ximo una [tasa tur√≠stica](https://www.diariouno.com.ar/economia/concesiones-50-anos-subsidios-y-exencion-impuestos-el-plan-atraer-inversiones-turismo-n1363699), cuyo valor oscilar√° entre uno y dos d√≥lares, a extranjeros que se alojen en hoteles locales. La provincia de Misiones cobrar√° a partir del a√±o pr√≥ximo una [tasa tur√≠stica](https://www.diariouno.com.ar/economia/concesiones-50-anos-subsidios-y-exencion-impuestos-el-plan-atraer-inversiones-turismo-n1363699), cuyo valor oscilar√° entre uno y dos d√≥lares, a extranjeros que se alojen en hoteles locales. La decisi√≥n fue aprobada en la Legislatura misionera, tras la aprobaci√≥n del Presupuesto provincial de 2025. En el expediente aprobado "se faculta al Poder Ejecutivo la posibilidad de crear un fondo provincial integrado con los recursos de la ‚ÄòTasa Tur√≠stica‚Äô, y los que disponga", se√±ala la normativa. En ese sentido, se especific√≥ que el objetivo de esa tasa "ser√° la promoci√≥n tur√≠stica internacional de Misiones, a fin de maximizar oportunidades del turismo internacional, potenciando el desarrollo econ√≥mico y social en todo el territorio de la provincia". El gobierno provincial anticip√≥ que destinar√° lo recaudado a la mejora de servicios tur√≠sticos, como as√≠ tambi√©n para la conservaci√≥n de infraestructura y promoci√≥n del turismo. ‚ñ∫TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [Las 3 rutas nacionales de Argentina que se deben recorrer una vez en la vida](https://www.diariouno.com.ar/motores/las-3-rutas-nacionales-argentina-que-se-deben-recorrer-una-vez-la-vida-n1363679) Los representantes de la oposici√≥n, en tanto, criticaron la decisi√≥n ya que no tuvo el debate "adecuado", habida cuenta que se incorpor√≥ a √∫ltimo momento en el temario de la Legislatura. Adem√°s, temen que el cobro de la tasa desaliente la llegada de turistas for√°neos, en especial por la fuerte competencia que representa Brasil, donde el costo de la estad√≠a suele ser m√°s bajo. El cobro a los turistas ya se aplica en otros destinos tradicionales del pa√≠s, como la Ciudad de Buenos Aires y San Carlos de Bariloche. ‚ñ∫TE PUEDE INTERESAR: [Un influencer destac√≥ los 10 lugares m√°s lindos de una ic√≥nica provincia de la Patagonia](https://www.diariouno.com.ar/sociedad/un-influencer-destaco-los-10-lugares-mas-lindos-una-iconica-provincia-la-patagonia-n1336881)

author: @CBS7News
title: The City of Odessa experiences a cyber incident
text:
The City of Odessa experiences a cyber incident
ODESSA, Texas (KOSA) - During the night of November 20, a cyber incident attacked the City of Odessa network.
Because of the attack, the City of Odessa‚Äôs network has been down all day, but it is expected to be fixed by November 22. .
The city‚Äôs cybersecurity team detected the attempt in progress last night and was able to shut it down before anything could get in or out of the system.
‚ÄúThey were able to follow the protocols we have in place to ensure the security of our network,‚Äù said Craig Stoker, the Odessa City Council Member At-Large.
Even though the attempt was detected and stopped, the cybersecurity team took the day to make sure the system was operating normally.
‚ÄúTo do a deep dive into our systems to make sure that nothing was infected and nothing is being held for ransom and that everything is operating as it should be. My understanding is so far so good. All the protocols we had in place worked,‚Äù Stoker said.
The city assures residents that none of their data was stolen.
As a result of the network being down, both the Municipal Court building and the Billing and Collection Department at City Hall has been closed all day.
The city assures residents that any payments due on November 21st will not be considered late.
Court dockets will have to be rescheduled, and there is no access to online payments, kiosks or window services.
‚ÄúCity Hall is a great group of folks who are working everyday to make sure that the city continues to provide the services that you need and it is a great team effort that makes those things happen,‚Äù said Stoker.
Magistration functions have been conducted using a paper system, with the computer portion completed at a later date.
That later date seems to be November 22.
‚ÄúThese are things we just have to be used to. This is why we have policies and procedures in place to detect and thort these kinds of things. They just happen. This is part of today‚Äôs world and I‚Äôm happy to know that the systems we had in place worked,‚Äù Stoker said.
Stoker updated First Alert 7 in a text around 3:15 pm, saying the initial report from the Cybersecurity Specialist looks positive and the estimated time to be up and running is around 5 am on Friday, November 22.

author: @rondasemanal
title: Casi 300 estudiantes de Primaria participan en los actos del D√≠a de la Constituci√≥n
text:
La delegaci√≥n municipal de Educaci√≥n ha celebrado este jueves el tradicional acto con motivo del D√≠a de la Constituci√≥n con la implicaci√≥n de los centros escolares de la ciudad y de los Cuerpos y Fuerzas de Seguridad del Estado. La programaci√≥n ha comenzado con un evento que se ha desarrollado en el teatro municipal ‚ÄòVicente Espinel‚Äô donde 285 alumnos y alumnas de 3¬∫ de Primaria de diez colegios ronde√±os han estado presentes y en el que los propios peque√±os se han encargado de leer algunos de los art√≠culos m√°s importantes de la Carta Magna.
Igualmente se ha proyectado un video donde, a trav√©s de dibujos animados, los estudiantes han conocido parte de la historia y del significado de la Constituci√≥n Espa√±ola y se ha procedido a la izada de la bandera espa√±ola con la presencia de representantes de Polic√≠a Local, Nacional, Bomberos, Guardia Civil, Protecci√≥n Civil y la Legi√≥n de Ronda.
La delegada municipal de Educaci√≥n, Alicia L√≥pez, ha destacado en su intervenci√≥n la importancia de conocer la Constituci√≥n y los derechos y deberes que en ella aparecen y que, ha dicho, son fundamentales para vivir en una sociedad igualitaria y libre. Igualmente ha se√±alado a los ni√±os y ni√±as que ellos deben ser los garantes de que en el futuro los valores que se promueven sigan siendo los pilares de la sociedad.
Tras el acto en el teatro, se ha procedido a un desfile de veh√≠culos de las Fuerzas de Seguridad en la plaza de Espa√±a donde han estado todos los escolares que luego han participado en diversas actividades en las que han podido conocer de cerca la labor de los profesionales de los cuerpos de seguridad del Estado.

author: PA News Agency
title: Dublin is safe compared to other western cities, Varadkar insists | Wisbech Standard
text: Dublin is a safe city when compared with others in the western world, the Taoiseach has insisted. Leo Varadkar said while it is important to acknowledge and listen to the experiences of those who have fallen victim to crime in Dublin, he insisted such incidents are not the norm for Ireland‚Äôs capital. There has been an increased focus on safety in Dublin following a series of well publicised random attacks and assaults on people in the city. That scrutiny intensified after the events of November 23, when rioting broke out in the city centre following a knife attack on three young children and their care assistant outside a primary school. Opposition parties claim a reduction in Garda numbers has contributed to a situation where parts of the city are no longer safe. It is a charge the Government has rejected. Mr Varadkar was asked about the issue of safety in Dublin at his end of year media briefing with political journalists. ‚ÄúThere‚Äôs no city that‚Äôs 100% safe,‚Äù he said. ‚ÄúIf you look at something like the murder rate, for example, in Ireland or Dublin, compare that to other countries or other major cities, you‚Äôll see that Dublin and Ireland are relatively safe relative to other countries and other cities in the western world. ‚ÄúBut there‚Äôs no place that‚Äôs 100% safe and I acknowledge that. What I say to people is that we‚Äôre taking actions in all of these areas, increasing Garda numbers and Garda resources, making our laws tougher, with tougher sentences in particular, appointing more judges, expanding our prison places. ‚Äú(There is) also a big focus now on community safety partnerships, because it can‚Äôt be all just about a law and order response. Other things are important too, including things like street lighting, like cameras, like engaging with different services around addiction and mental health and so on. That‚Äôs the approach that we‚Äôre taking.‚Äù Asked how he responded to accounts from individuals who have been assaulted in the capital, the Taoiseach added: ‚ÄúOf course I am concerned about individual negative experiences that people have in Dublin or anywhere else. That‚Äôs something you‚Äôre very aware of and very exposed to as a politician. ‚ÄúSomebody would have maybe a very bad experience of our health service. But I‚Äôm also aware of the counterfactual or the other sides of the story, if you‚Äôd like, the huge number of people who have a very positive experience of our health service, for example and say so when surveyed. ‚ÄúThe same thing applies to people coming into town, coming into our cities and coming into our country. ‚ÄúMost people, thankfully, don‚Äôt experience being victims of violent crime in Dublin or anywhere else. ‚ÄúWhile it‚Äôs really important that we listen to and acknowledge the stories of people who have a very bad experience, we have a responsibility as politicians and journalists not to make the mistake of thinking that bad experiences are the majority or are the norm.‚Äù

author: Team Latestly
title: ‚ÄòAssam Picture of Casteless Society‚Äô: Himanta Biswa Sarma Apologises For Incorrect Translation of Bhagavad Gita Verse | üì∞ LatestLY
text: Assam chief minister Himanta Biswa Sarma has apologised for his now-deleted post on X, formerly called Twitter, in which he wrote serving the Brahmins, Ksatriyas and Vaishyas is the natural duty of the Shudras. Sarma's post on X had landed him in the crosshairs of the Opposition with several leaders accusing him of promoting caste divisions. The post which sparked a political row had incorrectly said that according to the Gita, it is the duty of the Shudras to serve the other three castes - Brahmins, Kshatriyas, and Vaishyas. Sarma in his apology post also said that Assam was the picture of a casteless society and the incorrect translation was a mistake. [Assam Govt Announces Vacancies for Over 10,000 Posts in Education Department; CM Himanta Biswa Sarma Says, 'Will Exceed Promise of Creating More Than 1 Lakh Government Jobs'](https://www.latestly.com/socially/india/news/assam-govt-announces-vacancies-for-over-10000-posts-in-education-department-cm-himanta-biswa-sarma-says-will-exceed-promise-of-creating-more-than-1-lakh-government-jobs-5654335.html). Bhagavad Gita Verse Controversy As a routine I upload one sloka of Bhagavad Gita every morning on my social media handles. Till date, I have posted 668 slokas. Recently one of my team members posted a sloka from Chapter 18 verse 44 with an incorrect translation. As soon as I noticed the mistake, I promptly‚Ä¶ ‚Äî Himanta Biswa Sarma (@himantabiswa) [December 28, 2023] (SocialLY brings you all the latest breaking news, viral trends and information from social media world, including Twitter, Instagram and Youtube. The above post is embeded directly from the user's social media account and LatestLY Staff may not have modified or edited the content body. The views and facts appearing in the social media post do not reflect the opinions of LatestLY, also LatestLY does not assume any responsibility or liability for the same.)

author: Maurizio De Santis
title: L‚Äôinfortunio di Schwarz in Coppa del Mondo di sci √® tremendo: ginocchio destro spaccato
text:
L‚Äôinfortunio di Schwarz in Coppa del Mondo di sci √® tremendo: ginocchio destro spaccato
La stagione di Marco Schwarz √® finita nell'istante in cui ha perso il controllo degli sci e sulla pista di Bormio, in occasione della discesa di Coppa del Mondo di sci,
ha subito un incidente rovinoso al punto da provocare l'interruzione della gara e la necessit√† del trasporto in ospedale in elicottero.
L'esito degli esami diagnostici a cui √® stato sottoposto √® stato tremendo, s'√® spaccato il ginocchio destro. Un termine forte ma, a giudicare dai riscontri medici, la definizione rende bene l'idea del danno procurato. Lo stesso comunicato della federazione austriaca di sci non d√† adito a interpretazioni di sorta: "Nella caduta sulla pista di Bormio ha riportato una rottura del legamento crociato e del menisco mediale e un danno alla cartilagine del ginocchio destro". Schwarz dovr√† stare fuori a lungo, attenderlo c'√® un percorso di riabilitazione difficile dopo l'operazione.
Un brutto colpo per lo sciatore ma anche per il circuito iridato che perde per un grave infortunio l'atleta, attuale leader della classifica generale (e gi√† campione nella combinata a Cortina d‚ÄôAmpezzo 2021 e della Coppa del Mondo di slalom speciale), che finora aveva partecipato a tutte le tappe in calendario vincendo lo slalom di Madonna di Campiglio e conquistando tre secondi posti (lo slalom di Gurgl e i Giganti di Val d‚ÄôIs√®re e Badia).
Come s'√® fatto male Schwarz? Il campione carinziano ha perso l'equilibrio nella zona di Pian dell'Orso: sbilanciato nel movimento, le maggiori sollecitazioni le ha subite l'articolazione destra. I timori per la caduta sono stati successivamente confermati dai test effettuati a Innsbruck.
"A un certo punto della discesa ‚Äì sono le parole di Schwarz riportate dal sito della Federazione austriaca ‚Äì ho spinto dentro il mio ginocchio destro. Ho avuto subito la sensazione che qualcosa non andasse. Anche se sar√† necessaria un‚Äôoperazione posso dire sentirmi bene nonostante le circostanze. Voglio tornare ai miei livelli, dar√≤ tutto per questo".
A vincere la prova √® stato il francese Sarrazin che ha preceduto lo svizzero Odermatt e il canadese Alexander. Nulla da fare per l'azzurro sul quale erano riposte buone speranze: Dominik Paris, re della Stelvio e reduce dal bel successo ottenuto in Val Gardena, √® scivolato in una curva ed √® finito fuori dai giochi.
